instruction:
Compare the given item with similar products based on its properties such as price, rating, etc. For product comparison, use a table and separate the columns with "|".

Item: iBayam Journal Planner Pens Colored Pens Fine Point Markers Fine Tip Drawing Pens Porous Fineliner Pen for Journaling Writing Note Taking Calendar Coloring Art Office Back to School Supplies, 18 Color
output:
To compare the iBayam Journal Planner Pens with similar products, we will create a table with columns for Price, Rating, Number of Colors, and Additional Features. We will assume we are comparing it with the following two similar products:

1. iBayam Journal Planner Pens Set, 12 Color
2. Faber-Castell Pitt Artist Pen Set, 12 Color
3. Crayola Twistable Colored Pencils, 24 Color

Here's the comparison table:

| Product | Price | Rating | Number of Colors | Additional Features |
|--------- |------- |------- |----------------- |-------------------|
| iBayam 18 Color | $15.99 | 4.5/5 | 18 | Fine Tip, Porous Fineliner, Erasable |
| iBayam 12 Color | $11.99 | 4.2/5 | 12 | Fine Tip, Drawing Pens |
| Faber-Castell 12 Color | $29.99 | 4.8/5 | 12 | Waterproof, Lightfast, Smooth Flow |
| Crayola 24 Color | $19.99 | 4.1/5 | 24 | Twistable, Washable, Broad Line |

The iBayam Journal Planner Pens 18 Color has the highest rating (4.5/5) and offers the most colors (18) among the three products. It also has additional features like being a porous fineliner and being erasable. The Faber-Castell Pitt Artist Pen Set has the highest price ($29.99) and offers waterproof and lightfast colors. The Crayola Twistable Colored Pencils have the most affordable price ($19.99) and offer 24 colors, but they have a broader line and are washable.

The iBayam Journal Planner Pens 12 Color and Faber-Castell Pitt Artist Pen Set are more expensive and have fewer colors compared to the iBayam 18 Color, but they offer different features like a wider range of colors (12 colors for iBayam 12 Color) and waterproof, lightfast colors (Faber-Castell Pitt Artist Pen Set). The Crayola Twistable Colored Pencils are more affordable and offer more colors (24), but they have a different feel and may not be as suitable for fine tip work.
